resources.string: To make an emergency call during setup, press the \"Menu\" key.
You will need a MOTOBLUR account to use essential services on your phone as well as the MOTOBLUR Internet portal.

"By ticking the \"I agree\" box, you agree to the terms of the Motorola Software Licence Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement.
You must agree to these terms in order to use the device."
Please call customer service to retrieve your password.

"Setup is now complete.
If you have set up any accounts, we will now import content, such as your contacts and email. This may take up to 30 minutes but you can start using your phone straight away.
We recommend setting a security lock for this phone by going to Settings > Security & screen lock."

"You've completed all PC and device configurations.
Start using your phone right away…"
Your use of this phone is subject to the Motorola privacy policy and its terms.
"Google's location service provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS. You can disable these features in Settings, under Location services."
"Allow Google's location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running."
"Email address must be at least 6 characters long and consist of letters, numbers and underscore (_). "For example: "youremail@domain.co.uk "
There was an error creating your account. Please try again.

To verify your login please enter the text into the field below
The account was disabled on the Blur service

The server had no response. Check the service is working and try again.

The request required user credentials, but they were not provided in the request.
Incorrect current password. Please try again.
The phone radio is unable to connect to the network. Make sure the radio is on or, if it is on, move into an area with better coverage and try again.
Unable to connect at this time, try again later.
The request timed out waiting for a response. The account may have been incorrectly created.
You have tried to reset your password too many times today. Please try again later.
The Blur service indicated your request was unauthorised. Check the Blur service is working.
This account is being used by another device. This device must be erased before this account can be used.
Your ID and/or password were not recognised. Please check and try again. If you have forgotten your password, press the \"Forgotten password\" button to get it sent to you by email.
The authentication has expired. Please try again.
There is a problem with the clock on the device. Please contact customer service.
There was an error retrieving information.
Social networking applications are set to sync over Wi-Fi only.
There were errors getting data from the Blur service.
Internet data connection needed to view Terms and Conditions.
Internet data connection needed to view data analytics.
"Your phone number must only contain digits, '-' or '+'"
"Please select a connection type to finish setup"

"If you skip setup, some features on the device will not be available.
The device will remind you to complete setup when a data connection is available or if you try to use an application that needs you to complete setup.
Select \"Next\" to view the Location consent text. Then setup will be complete and you will see the Home screen."

"Connection failed! In order to complete setup you need a data connection.
Please press the \"Retry\" button when you get back into network coverage."
The SIM card was recently removed. Sign in to your account to verify identity.
Sign in to your account to verify identity.
Loading an existing MOTOBLUR account will remove all Email accounts from your device and replace them with the accounts stored in your MOTOBLUR profile.

"\"System updates\" is not available without a Motorola service account.
Would you like to set up an account now?"
"\"{0}\" is not available without a social networking account. To create a new account, press the \"Setup\" button."

"In order to complete setup, you need a data connection.
You have the following choices:"

"Restore contacts, settings and accounts from a previous Motorola device? "
A MotoCast ID is required to restore content.

The default quick upload account for videos is not set up. Would you like to set up the default quick upload account now and continue this upload?
This upload will be queued for transfer when Wi-Fi becomes available. To upload immediately, go to settings to disable data saver.

Uploading over the network may take longer than using a Wi-Fi network.
is not available without a Blur account. To create a new account or log in to an existing one, press setup

Motorola is serious about protecting the information that you entrust to us. This privacy policy describes how we collect information from your mobile device and what we do with it. Standard data usage charges may apply. You can learn more by reading our full Privacy Statement.
Select a privacy profile that best suits your needs.
Applications that can access your device location and what this information can help you do.

If you enable our location-based services, we will access location information based on GPS coordinates and the location of nearby mobile phone towers and wireless networks to help you search for places near you, link patterns of device usage to significant locations and suggest appropriate device behaviour, research ways to improve our products and services and comply with applicable laws.
Types of data collected from your device and how it is used to help Motorola improve services.

Depending on which privacy profile you select, we will collect some or all of the following information: core functional data, performance data, analytics data, personal information, your application usage history, publicly available information from social network profiles linked to your device and information about the websites you visit using your device’s built-in browser. We use this information to enable you to send and receive messages through your email and social network accounts, help support, troubleshoot and optimise your device’s performance, tell you about Motorola products and services, develop improvements to Motorola products and services and perform demographic analysis and model market segments.
Your device does not use web tracking technologies such as tags or cookies.

We do not place or access web tracking technologies such as pixel tags or cookies on your device to store sensitive information such as passwords or your personal data, analyse traffic, personalise device features or research ways to improve Motorola products and services. However, websites you visit or apps that you install and use on your mobile device may place and use such trackers, subject to their own terms of use.
Motorola uses standard security practices and protocols.

Before we share your information with service providers working on our behalf, we will require them to protect your information according to our standards and not to use your information for any independent purpose. We also use standard technical and organisational security measures to protect the information that we collect and use to provide you with services and support. You should use the security features provided to keep your device secure at all possible times.
Contact Motorola with any questions or concerns.

"You can contact Motorola to review, amend, correct, update or delete your information or to ask questions about this privacy policy statement by contacting:
Motorola Mobility Privacy Compliance Program 600 US Highway 45, W435M Libertyville, IL 60048 USA Email: privacy@motorola.com"
View the entire Motorola Privacy Policy.
Internet data connection needed to view Privacy Policy.

"Your device accesses location information based on GPS coordinates and mobile phone tower locations and wireless networks.
This information is used to:
-Find places near you -Link patterns of device usage to significant locations and suggest device behaviour. -Research ways to improve Motorola products & services -Comply with legal obligations {1}FULL LOCATION SERVICES POLICY;;{2}FULL Location services text. FULL Location services text. FULL Location services text. FULL Location services text. FULL Location services text. FULL Location services text. "

We can collect information about how you use your device in order to provide you with enhanced customer support and improve the quality of our products and services. Please select a privacy profile that meets your needs. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy.
"You can change your selection at any time by going to the Privacy menu in your device's Settings application."
No data will be collected, except for anonymous information to keep your device up to date
Information for technical support and to keep your device up to date
Information needed to support your device and to make recommendations about Motorola products
Standard data plus information so your device can help you find places near you and make other recommendations

We will only collect core functional data necessary to perform basic functions like determining whether your device has an available software update. If you select this option, this will negatively affect our ability to provide technical support to your device.

If you select the Support only privacy profile, we will only collect core functional data and support information needed to provide improved technical support to your device. We will only use this information for troubleshooting purposes and to follow up with you after we have provided support for your device.

If you select the Standard profile, we will collect core functional data, performance data and analytics data. In addition to support information, we will collect and analyse information about how you use your device in order to make improvements to our products and services, make recommendations to you regarding Motorola products and services and further enhance our ability to support your device.

To give you the best possible user experience, we collect core functional information, support information, performance data, information about how you use your device, the location of your device, your use of the built-in web browser, application usage history and publicly available social profile information. We will use this information to further enhance our technical support capabilities, let SmartActions analyse your location, make improved recommendations and perform demographic analysis.

To give you the best possible user experience, we collect core functional information, support information, performance data, information about how you use your device, the location of your device, your use of the built-in web browser, application usage history and publicly available social profile information. We will use this information to further enhance our technical support capabilities and perform demographic analysis.

Unable to connect at this time. You can visit again from Settings > About phone > Legal information.

I agree to the Motorola Terms and Privacy policies
Use your Google account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data. If you previously backed up your account, you can restore it to this phone now.
You can change your backup settings at any time in Privacy settings.
